nodes.bodyText: nit: {@link DoFn} or even better if there is a subsection of the Javadoc that is best to read.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -652,9 +652,8 @@ * interval, until the given termination condition is reached. The returned {@link PCollection} * is unbounded. * - *

This works only in runners supporting {@link Kind#SPLITTABLE_DO_FN}. + *

This works only in runners supporting splittable DoFn.
